attributes.action: ensure that fines arising out of the dairy products scam perpetrated by the large supermarkets in this country do not go to the Scottish Cabinet's favourite charities (foreign organisations of any colour, creed or preference) but are paid out to the farmers for whom the original money was ripped off the paying public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
